Verses: 1 aanapadiyinaale, Neengal Marupadiyum Adimaiththanaththin Nugaththukkutpadaamal, Kiristhu Namakku Undaakkina Suyaadheena Nilaimaiyile Nilaikondirungal.
2 idho, Neengal Viruththasedhanampannikkondaal Kiristhuvinaal Ungalukku Oru Pirayojanamumiraadhu Endru Pavulaagiya Naan Ungalukkuch Chollugiren.
3 melum, Viruththasedhanampannikkollugira Endha Manushanum Niyaayappiramaanam Muzhuvadhaiyum Niraivetrak Kadanaaliyaayirukkiraan Endru Marupadiyum Appadippattavanukku Saatchiyaagach Sollugiren.
4 niyaayappiramaanaththinaal Needhimaangalaaga Virumbugira Neengal Yaavarum Kiristhuvaivittup Pirindhu Kirubaiyinindru Vizhundheergal.
5 naangalo Needhikidaikkumendru Aaviyaikkondu Visuvaasaththinaal Nambikkaiyode Kaaththirukkirom.
6 kiristhu Yesuvinidaththil Viruththasedhanamum Viruththasedhanamillaamaiyum Ondrukkum Udhavaadhu, Anbinaal Kiriyaiseygira Visuvaasame Udhavum.
7 neengal Nandraai Odineergale; Saththiyaththirkuk Keezhppadiyaamarpoga Ungalukkuth Thadaiseydhavan Yaar?
8 indhap Bodhanai Ungalai Azhaiththavaraal Undaanadhalla.
9 pulippulla Konjamaavaanadhu Pisaindha Maavanaiththaiyum Ubbappannum.

10 neengal Veruvidhamaaich Sindhikkamaatteergalendru Naan Karththarukkul Ungalaikkuriththu Nambikkaiyaayirukkiren; Ungalaik Kalakkugiravan Eppadippattavanaayirundhaalum Thanakketra Aakkinaiyai Adaivaan.
11 sagodharare, Idhuvaraikkum Naan Viruththasedhanaththaip Pirasangikkiravanaayirundhaal, Idhuvaraikkum Ennaththirkuth Thunpappadugiren? Appadiyaanaal Siluvaiyaippatri Varum Idaral Ozhindhirukkume.
12 ungalaik Kalakkugiravargal Tharippunduponaal Nalamaayirukkum.
13 sagodharare, Neengal Suyaadheenaththirku Azhaikkappatteergal, Indha Suyaadheenaththai Neengal Maamsaththirkedhuvaaga Anusariyaamal, Anbinaale Oruvarukkoruvar Oozhiyanjseyyungal.
14 unnidaththil Nee Anbukooruvadhupolap Piranidaththilum Anbukooruvaayaaga, Engira Indha Ore Vaarththaiyile Niyaayappiramaanam Muzhuvadhum Niraiverum.
15 neengal Oruvaraiyoruvar Kadiththup Patchiththeergalaanaal Azhiveergal. Appadi Oruvaraaloruvar Azhikkappadaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
16 pinnum Naan Sollugiradhennavendraal, Aavikketrapadi Nadandhukollungal, Appozhudhu Maamsa Ichchaiyai Niraivetraadhiruppeergal.
17 maamsam Aavikku Virodhamaagavum, Aavi Maamsaththukku Virodhamaagavum Ichchikkiradhu; Neengal Seyyavendumendrirukkiravaigalaich Cheyyaadhapadikku, Ivaigal Ondrukkondru Virodhamaayirukkiradhu.
18 aaviyinaal Nadaththappaduveergalaanaal, Neengal Niyaayappiramaanaththirkuk Keezhppattavargalalla.
19 maamsaththin Kiriyaigal Veliyarangamaayirukkindrana, Avaiyaavana: Vibachaaram, Vesiththanam, Asuththam, Kaamavigaaram,
20 vikkiragaaraadhanai, Pillisooniyam, Pagaigal, Virodhangal, Vairaakkiyangal, Kobangal, Sandaigal, Pirivinaigal, Maarkkapedhangal,

21 poraamaigal, Kolaigal, Verigal, Kaliyaattugal Mudhalaanavaigale; Ippadippattavaigalaich Seygiravargal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Sudhandharippadhillaiyendru Munne Naan Sonnadhupola Ippozhudhum Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
22 aaviyin Kaniyo, Anbu, Sandhosham, Samaadhaanam, Neediyaporumai, Dhayavu, Nargunam, Visuvaasam,
23 saandham, Ichchaiyadakkam; Ippadippattavaigalukku Virodhamaana Piramaanam Ondrumillai.
24 kiristhuvinudaiyavargal Thangal Maamsaththaiyum Adhin Aasai Ichchaigalaiyum Siluvaiyil Araindhirukkiraargal.
25 naam Aaviyinaale Pizhaiththirundhaal, Aavikketrapadi Nadakkavum Kadavom.
26 veen Pugazhchchiyai Virumbaamalum, Oruvaraiyoruvar Kobamoottaamalum, Oruvarmel Oruvar Poraamaikollaamalum Irukkakkadavom.
